overview: Ubay (50) is a dangdut musician and the owner of a dangdut cart group in Jakarta. Together with his dangdut cart member, he wants to record their songs. A long-held desires must be realized before they get old. Didiet (53) is Ubayâ€™s old friend who is willing to help them to realize their dreams, even though he only has the basic recording device and an old computer. They meet some difficulties while they are in the recording session. Nevertheless, their great passion for Dangdut is the main reason for facing it all.
title: The Tone Wheels
